summary.span: 命名空间提供高级 GDI+ 排版功能。

span.span: The namespace provides advanced GDI+ typography functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基本图形功能由 命名空间提供。Basic graphics functionality is provided by the namespace. 此命名空间中的类允许用户创建和使用字体集合。The classes in this namespace allow users to create and use collections of fonts. > [!CAUTION] > 命名空间中的类 不支持在 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服务中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 尝试从这些应用程序类型之一中使用这些类可能会产生意外的问题，例如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
